intro: Discover a world of charming Furries and win over 12 unique characters influenced by their zodiac signs and species.
description:
In this game of romance and self-discovery, you’ll dive into deep conversations, exploring their inner worlds and challenging your ability to connect with them on a deeper level. Can you find true love before time runs out?


Game Features:

-12 Furries, 12 signs, 12 challenges: Each character has a unique personality shaped by their zodiac sign and species. From a mysterious wolf to a flirty fox, discover what wins their hearts and how to earn their trust.

-Captivating conversations: Talk to them, gain their attention, send messages, and plan special moments that leave a lasting impression on their hearts.

-Connection meter: Watch your bond grow or weaken based on your choices. Can you build a genuine relationship and fill their hearts before time runs out?

-Emotional and unique endings: Depending on your decisions, each character will react in their own way, unlocking heartfelt, romantic, or challenging endings that reflect the depth of your relationship.

-Zodiac rituals and secrets: As you progress, uncover unique challenges and intimate secrets tied to their zodiac sign and personality, deepening your connection even further.

-30 days for true love: The challenge is to win their hearts and find your soulmate in just one month! Every choice, every interaction counts.

Are you ready to immerse yourself in this vibrant world filled with passion, humor, and unexpected twists? 

Meet the enchanting Furries, experience intense romances, and discover if you can find true love. 

Your destiny is written in the stars!
